headline: The J.M. Smucker Co. Declares Dividend and Announces Annual Shareholder Meeting Date
summary: The J.M. Smucker Co. (NYSE: SJM) today announced its Board of Directors approved a $1.08 per share dividend on the common shares of the Company. The dividend will be paid on Monday, June 2, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Friday, May 16, 2025.
